concept.title: What's New in Graphics in Symbian^3
concept.shortdesc: This section describes the changes introduced in the Graphics package in Symbian^3.

section.title: ScreenPlay

section.title: Interface breaks and deprecated functionality
section.p: On ScreenPlay, support for direct screen access (DSA) is maintained for backward compatibility reasons, although Symbian recommends the use of external surfaces in preference to DSA. However, whereas on some earlier devices, applications might work without fully conforming to the rules of DSA, these rules are now necessarily enforced. See DSA Migration Guide for information about the guidelines applications must follow in order to be able to run correctly on a ScreenPlay device.

li.p: Creating transparent windows using a mask and RWindow is deprecated. See Transparent Windows for more information.
Backed-up windows are deprecated. See Displayable Windows for more information.
